content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) with chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) 
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59) 
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5)

### Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53) with chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51)
- Output chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Output chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks for water and steam
- Multiple electricity poles forming electricity group (id 14823)

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if production line is actually producing items before trying to collect them
- Ensure correct chest position is being referenced

### Research related errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Verify required science packs are available before starting research

### Production line issues
- Monitor assembling machine status for ingredient shortages
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain power generation
- Check if all required ingredients are available before starting production

### Entity placement errors
- Verify target position is clear before placing entities
- Check if required resources are available for placement
- Ensure proper spacing between entities
